description:
Inaugural meeting of Front-end Brussels


 We will have our first talk : "Security for websockets" 

By Mickael Van der Beek, Lead security at Sagacify 


Come with your front-end friends this Thursday 26 June at 7:00 pm
See you upstairs at « Clover Bar » 

Rue Middelbourg 4, 1170 Watermael-Boitsfort ( Wiener )

BUS : 17, 95 / TRAM : 94
name: Introduce the group, talks, lightning talks, discussions and drink !

description:
Every last wednesday of the month Front-end-Brussels welcomes you to their   awesome meetups !

Bring your stuffs and show them to the group, if you have slides make the font big enough for an HDMI TV (1920 * 1080)

A laptop will be available so you can only take your USB key.

See you at « Clover Bar »  

Avenue Georges Henri 509, 1200 Woluwe-Saint-Lambert ( Merode )

METRO: 1, 5 / BUS : 22, 27, 61, 80 / TRAM : 81, 83
name: Drinks, talks  and thoughts on front-end

description:
Let's go to the DevFest Belgium 2014 !!

Hour friend Friedger Müffke is invinting us to join the party !

http://gdg-brussels.org/DevFest2014/

more info : http://www.meetup.com/gdg-brussels/events/212022342/ and here https://plus.google.com/events/c7t899o1viosokhkngu63a9plsk
